alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Geneva; Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 24 at 2:18AM CST until January 25 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM EST /MIDNIGHT CST/ TO 10 AM EST /9 AM CST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Alabama, Big Bend and Panhandle Florida and southwest Georgia. * WHEN...From 1 AM EST /midnight CST/ to 10 AM EST /9 AM CST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will gradually increase tonight, then peak just in advance of a cold front. Winds will decrease quickly following the cold frontal passage later Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained winds of 26 to 39 mph are expected for at least 2 hours, or gusts between 40 to 57 mph for any length of time are possible.Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
